articles.description: iQOO has added another edition to its Z6-series with the launch of iQOO Z6 Lite 5G under Rs. 15,000. The highlight is that it packs the new Snapdragon 4 Gen 1 chipset, 50MP camera, and a lot more. Have a quick look here.

articles.title: After Apple's locally-made iPhone, Google now wants to make Pixel phones in India - India Today
articles.description: It is unclear which Pixel phone Google is planning to produce in India. Currently, Google sells only its mid-range devices like Pixel 4a and 6a in the country.
articles.content: Google is reportedly planning to move some of its Pixel phone production units to India. According to The Information (via TechCrunch), the Android maker has solicited bids from manufacturers to asse… [+1770 chars]
